com.maverick.ssh.components.jce
Class Ssh1RsaPublicKey

java.lang.Object
  com.maverick.ssh.components.jce.Ssh2RsaPublicKey
      com.maverick.ssh.components.jce.Ssh1RsaPublicKey
All Implemented Interfaces:
SshPublicKey, SshRsaPublicKey
public class Ssh1RsaPublicKey
extends Ssh2RsaPublicKey

RSA public key implementation for the SSH1 protocol. Different implementations are required for SSH1 & SSH2 because of the way the keys are represented in the protocol encoding.

Author:
Lee David Painter
